Text:
beware of swarm poisoners.

if you see above.net ip's in your peer list ban 'em to hell.
they're using the following ip range:
209.249.98.1 - 209.249.98.255
and also
209.249.45.1 - 209.249.45.255
their client is azureus 4.2.0.2

thanks for your cooperation in keepin' the swarm fucker-free.
